text: Yefremkasinskoye Rural Settlement (; , Yountapa jal tărăkhĕ) is an administrativeIn accordance with Law #28, the municipal divisions in the Chuvash Republic are considered to be its administrative-territorial divisions and municipal division (a rural settlement) of Alikovsky District of the Chuvash Republic, Russia.Law #37 It is located in the central part of the district. Its administrative center is the locality (a village) of Yefremkasy. Rural settlement's population: 2,608 (2006 est.). Yefremkasinskoye Rural Settlement comprises thirteen rural localities. The Cheboksary–Vurnary highway crosses the territory of the rural settlement. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * ==Further reading== *L. A. Yefimov, "Alikovsky District" ("Элĕк Енĕ"), Alikovo, 1994. *"Аликовская энциклопедия" (Alikovsky District's Encyclopedia), authors: Yefimov L. A., Yefimov Ye. L., Ananyev A. A., Terentyev G. K. Cheboksary, 2009, . == Other websites == *Official website of Yefremkasinskoye Rural Settlement __NOTOC__ Category:Alikovsky District Category:Rural settlements of the Chuvash Republic
title: Yefremkasinskoye Rural Settlement
